praying <S%G4336><s%> at the same <S%G260><s%> time <S%G260><s%> for us as well, <S%G2532><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> may open <S%G455><s%> up to us a door <S%G2374><s%> for the word, <S%G3056><s%> so that we may speak <S%G2980><s%> forth <S%G2980><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> for which <S%G3739><s%> I have also <S%G2532><s%> been imprisoned; <S%G1210><s%>

Let your speech <S%G3056><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> be with grace, <S%G5485><s%> seasoned, <S%G741><s%> [as it were,] with salt, <S%G217><s%> so that you may know <S%G3609><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> you should <S%G1163><s%> respond <S%G611><s%> to each <S%G1538><s%> person. <S%G1520><s%>

For I have sent <S%G3992><s%> him to you for this <S%G3778><s%> very <S%G846><s%> purpose, that you may know <S%G1097><s%> [about] our circumstances <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4012><s%> and that he may encourage <S%G3870><s%> your hearts; <S%G2588><s%>

For I bear <S%G3140><s%> him witness <S%G3140><s%> that he has <S%G2192><s%> a deep <S%G4183><s%> concern <S%G4192><s%> for you and for those <S%G3588><s%> who are in Laodicea <S%G2993><s%> and Hierapolis. <S%G2404><s%>

And when <S%G3752><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> letter <S%G1992><s%> is read <S%G314><s%> among <S%G3844><s%> you, have <S%G4160><s%> it also <S%G2532><s%> read <S%G314><s%> in the church <S%G1577><s%> of the Laodiceans; <S%G2994><s%> and you, for your part read <S%G314><s%> my letter [that is coming] from Laodicea. <S%G2993><s%>

And say <S%G3004><s%> to Archippus, <S%G751><s%> "Take <S%G991><s%> heed <S%G991><s%> to the ministry <S%G1248><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have received <S%G3880><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that you may fulfill <S%G4137><s%> it."
